title: Drawing, Three Deeds of Hercules, 1813
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper
markings: Watermark: bird upon triple mount in circle.
inscribed: Inscribed: nozze di Ercole con Ebe; Ercole Deianira centauro; Ercole vince la regina  delle amazoni
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Circular medallion showing Dejanire mounting Nessus. At center, sphere octagon showing Jupiter performing marriage of Hebe and Hercules in presence of gods. At bottom, circular medallion showing Hercules victorious over Queen of Amazons.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Three Deeds of Hercules, 1813. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3263
